allIssues.description: Ensures an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
allIssues.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes
allIssues.summary: Fix all of the following:\n  ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-selected="true"

allIssues.description: Ensures an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
allIssues.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes
allIssues.summary: Fix all of the following:\n  ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-selected="false"

allIssues.description: Ensures an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
allIssues.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes
allIssues.summary: Fix all of the following:\n  ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-selected="false"

allIssues.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
allIssues.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  Element has children which are not allowed: li[tabindex]\n  Element uses aria-busy="true" while showing a loader

allIssues.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
allIssues.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  Element has children which are not allowed: li[tabindex]\n  Element uses aria-busy="true" while showing a loader
allIssues.source: • Geschäftskunden

allIssues.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
allIssues.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly
allIssues.summary: Fix all of the following:\n  the autocomplete attribute is incorrectly formatted
allIssues.source: <input type="text" inputmode="text" class="form-control" name="address.receiver.name2" id="address.receiver.name2" minlength="0" maxlength="35" required="" placeholder="" autocomplete="nope" value="">

allIssues.description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically
allIssues.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  List item does not have a <ul>, <ol> parent element without a role, or a role="list"
allIssues.source: • Privatkunden

allIssues.description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically
allIssues.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  List item does not have a <ul>, <ol> parent element without a role, or a role="list"
allIssues.source: • Geschäftskunden

allIssues.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
allIssues.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  maximum-scale on <meta> tag disables zooming on mobile devices

allIssues.description: Ensures <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text
allIssues.help: <svg> elements with an img role must have an alternative text
allIssues.summary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has no child that is a title
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
